```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data(rest_inspec)

set.seed(1)

rest_inspec_brooklyn = 
  rest_inspec %>%
  select(.data = ., boro, cuisine_description, score, grade, violation_code) %>%
    filter(.data = ., boro == "BROOKLYN", score != "NA", grade != "NA") %>%
  sample_n(5000)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
rest_inspec_brooklyn %>%
  mutate(.data = ., as.factor(grade)) %>%
  count(grade) %>%
  filter(.data = ., n != "NA") %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~reorder(grade, -n), y = ~n, color = ~grade, type = "bar")
```


Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Distribution of violation codes by cuisine type in Brooklyn, New York

```{r}
rest_inspec_brooklyn %>%
  group_by(boro, grade) %>%
  count(violation_code) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  filter(.data = ., n > 20) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~grade, y = ~violation_code, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", color = ~grade) %>%
  layout(xaxis = list(title = "Type of Cuisine", size = 6, tickangle = 45),
         yaxis = list(title = "Number of critical flags", size = 6))            
```

### Distribution of health inspection scores among sweets-related restaurants in Brooklyn 

```{r}
rest_inspec_brooklyn %>%
  filter(.data = ., cuisine_description == "Donuts" | cuisine_description == "Bakery" | cuisine_description == "Ice Cream, Gelato, Yogurt, Ices") %>%
  group_by(cuisine_description) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~cuisine_description, y = ~score, type = "box", color = ~cuisine_description)
```
